downloadTitle: Test Lab Guide: Demonstrating Forefront Identity Manager 2010 Certificate Management Delegated Smart Card Registration
downloadDescription: Delegated smart card registration with FIM CM in a test lab.
detailsSection: This document will assist architects, consultants, system engineers, and system administrators in deploying smart cards with Microsoft® Forefront® Identity Manager 2010 Certificate Management in a test lab.  The resulting FIM CM test lab will deomonstrate the use of smart cards using a delegated registraion model.
systemRequirementsSection:
Operating Systems:  Windows Server 2008 R2

Microsoft SQL Server 2008 with Service Pack 2

Microsoft Exchange 2010 with Service Pack 1

Microsoft Forefront Identity Manager 2010

Update 1 for Microsoft Forefront Identity Manager 2010
USB Smart Card reader
Gemalto .NET Smart Card
installInstructionSection: Click Download to download this document.
